description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Big Breakfast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Breakfast,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Quick & easy breakfast,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Mushroom,Father's Day,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Tofu
name: Vegan Big Breakfast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tofu in a food processor and process until medium chunks form resembling scrambled egg.

Heat 1/2 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add tomatoes, cutside down, and cook for 2 minutes or until starting to colour. Flip and cook for a further minute, then remove from pan and season with pepper. Add remaining oil to pan and add mushrooms. Cook for 2 minutes each side or until starting to colour. Remove from pan and season with pepper.

Add tofu to the hot pan. Add turmeric and stir to colour tofu, then add capsicum and peas and cook for 23 minutes or until capsicum has softened slightly and peas are heated through. Stir through parsley, spring onion and nutritional yeast flakes.
Serve tofu scramble on toast with mushrooms and tomatoes on the side.
